<script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(document).ready(function () {

        jQuery.la.authentification.initForm();
        jQuery('#openSearchModal, #openSearchModal2').click(function () {
            jQuery('body').removeClass('opened_burger_menu');
            jQuery('#mySearch').load('/Concours-et-cadeaux/search/modal?site=replay' + ' #search_form', function () {
                               jQuery("#search_form form").attr("action", '//replay.gulli.fr/search');
                jQuery.la.autocompletion.init('replaySearch[searchText]');
            });
        });
    });
</script></div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        //do work
        if(typeof document.querySelectorAll("#nonstop .item a")[0] != "undefined") {
            var url = document.querySelectorAll("#nonstop .item a")[0].href;
            if (url.search("Direct") != -1 ){
                url = document.querySelectorAll("#nonstop .item a")[1].href;
            }
            document.querySelector("#nonstop .bloc_titre a").href = url;
            document.querySelector("#nonstop  .linkall").href = url;
        }
    })



</script>
                    
                                        
            
                <div class="bloc bloc_slideshow">
    <div class="bloc_titre"><h2><a href="//replay.gulli.fr/derniere_chance">Dernière chance</a></h2></div>

                        <span class="expiration"><i class="icon-temps-restant"></i>Reste 2j 7h 12m</span>
                    </a>
                </div>
                                                
                
                                    

                

            <div class="item owl-lazy" data-src="https://placehold.it/260x195/bff2a7?text=&nbsp;">
                <a href="https://replay.gulli.fr/dessins-animes/Foot-2-rue-extreme/VOD68991928342000" target="_self">
                                            <span class="visuel"><img width="260" height="147" alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," data-src="https://resize-gulli.jnsmedia.fr/rcrop/260,147/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/439827_0.jpg" class="img-responsive la_lazy_image_replay" /><i class="picto-play"></i></span>
                                        <span class="texte">
                                                    <span class="titre">Sois toi-même</span>
                                                    <span class="infos">S1 ép. 18</span>
                            <span class="vote"><span class="note"><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i
                                            class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i
                                            class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><span class="result"
